name: Drop-in: Classic Movie Night
description: Come to Glen Park Rec Center Tuesday nights for Classic Movie Night! Free admission, and snacks are sometimes included. Visit the Glen Park Rec Center webpage for the film lineup.
fullDescription: Come to Glen Park Rec Center Tuesday nights for Classic Movie Night! Free admission, and snacks are sometimes included. Visit the Glen Park Rec Center webpage for the film lineup.
whatTheyOffer: Come to Glen Park Rec Center Tuesday nights for Classic Movie Night! Free admission, and snacks are sometimes included. Visit the Glen Park Rec Center webpage for the film lineup.
howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time.
